# Pull Request

Thank you for contributing to `bldrx`! Please complete this template to help reviewers evaluate your changes quickly.

## Summary

Provide a short description of the changes and the motivation.

## Related issues

Link relevant issues (e.g., `Closes #123`) or explain if this is a follow-up to previous work.

## What changed

- Summarize the main changes and any notable design decisions.

## How to test

Provide steps to test the change locally, including commands, sample inputs, and expected outputs.

1. Step 1
2. Step 2

## Checklist

- [ ] I added or updated tests where applicable
- [ ] I updated documentation (README, docs/) as needed
- [ ] I added a changelog entry if this changes behavior
- [ ] I followed the project's code style and guidelines
- [ ] All CI checks pass
- [ ] I did not add new dependencies without prior discussion

## Notes for reviewers

Any other context the reviewer should know (edge cases, performance impact, etc.).

*Maintainers may request changes or ask for further details; please respond to feedback to keep the review moving.*
